snippet: An internal report written by a management task force pointed to widespread failures regarding a bad bet on credit derivatives that cost JPMorgan Chase more than $6 billion.
abstract: An internal report written by a management task force pointed to widespread failures regarding a bad bet on credit derivatives that cost JPMorgan Chase more than $6 billion.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and PETER EAVIS

headline.main: Report Details Missteps in Trading at JPMorgan
headline.print_headline: Report Details Missteps In Trading at JPMorgan
